Class KDOP

  • java.lang.Object
    • geom.Shape
      • geom.KDOP

  • public class KDOP
extends Shape
    A k-discrete oriented polytope.
    Author:
    BRANGER Mathias, CROUZET Matthieu, MACE Quentin.
